#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>

using namespace std;

int T, N;

int main()
{
	//ifstream cin ("main.in");

	int i;

	cin >> T;
	while (T--)
	{
		cin >> N;

		i = N / 7;
		i = i * 7;
		while (true)
		{
			if ((N - i) % 4 == 0)
			{
				cout << i << endl;
				break;
			}
		
			if (i == 0)
			{
				cout << "-1" << endl;
				break;
			}

			i -= 7;
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
